full_description:
\n
Join the Winning Team
\n
Be part of an amazing team of innovative technologists and creative thinkers
\n
We look for people with excellent soft skills, brilliant minds and great aspiration for self-perfection and constant career development
\n
\n
\n
BI Analyst
\n
\n
\n
\n
Description
\n
\n
Perform requirements gathering & technical specifications of requirements; be involved in deployment process as well as design & development; develop BI applications & solutions. Travel to various unanticipated client sites.
\n
\n
Requirements
\n
\n
Master's degree (or foreign equi. degree) in C.S, Engg. Electrical Engg. or rel. with knowledge of at least 7 of the following technologies: SSAS, SSRS, SQL Server, PL/SQL, Oracle, Cognos, Informatica, UNIX, Windows, TOAD, Java, C++ & HTML.
\n
\n
Apply:
Oncorre, Inc. 1170 US 22 East, Suite 307, Bridgewater, NJ 08807
\n
\n
\n
\n
Why Join Us
\n
We strive to build a team of skilled professionals with diverse backgrounds enjoying their job and the work environment. We treat everyone with honesty and respect.
\n
\n
\n
Flexible work environment
\n
Ability to work remotely
\n
Paid vacation, holidays & sick days
\n
Business education & certifications
\n
Health insurance
\n
401K plan
\n
Performance evaluation & career improvement
\n
\n
\n
